attributes.action: This e-petition is for the BBC to replace Gary Lineker with Laura Esposto as the main presenter on 'Match of the Day'
attributes.additional_details: This e-petition is for the BBC to replace Gary Lineker with Laura Esposto as the main presenter on 'Match of the Day'. Furthermore make each game shown of an equal time: Not twenty minutes for a Man Utd game and only two minutes for an Aston Villa game. This move will bring glamour and revitalise to this flagging show.
